title: Wikipedia - Occupy Movement
description:
"The Occupy movement is an international protest movement against social and economic inequality, its primary goal being to make the economic and political relations in all societies less vertically hierarchical and more flatly distributed. Local groups often have different foci, but among the movement's prime concerns is the belief that large corporations and the global financial system control the world in a way that disproportionately benefits a minority, undermines democracy and is unstable."

Wikipedia Occupy Movement ebook. Selected articles from Wikipedia related to the Occupy Movement in .epub format. 

This book is part of the radical seed collection (https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9389639/Op_Radical_Seed).
